q3: Will Mexico qualify for the World Cup next time?
a3: It is very likely as their superstar players like Hernandez, Santos, and Velos are still very young and developing in Europe with the big clubs.

q5: Do you believe Hirving (el Chucky) Lozano will be Mexico's next biggest star.
a5: Lozano will be a godsend for Mexico whom, in my opinion, is on the rise for the next World Cup. They have the pieces set in place.
